title: Saipan Harbor
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo of Saipan Harbor
Robert's Notes: Saipan Harbor

title: Weixian Concentration Camp
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Arial photo of the Weixian Concentration Camp run by the Japanese.
Robert's Notes: A section of Weihsien, China. Note the towers, and the moat surrounding the place.
location: Weixian Concentration Camp, Weifang, Shandong, China

title: Islands in the Seto Island Sea
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Arial photo of some islands in the Seto Inland Sea
Robert's Notes: Islands in the Inland Sea, at Hiroshima, Japan

title: Island in the Seto Inland Sea
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Arial photo of an island in the Seto Inland Sea
Robert's Notes: An Island in the Inland Sea, Hiroshima, Japan

title: SB17-G "Dumbo"
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo of an SB17-G, a B-17 flying fortress that was converted for use in Air-Sea rescue. The cockpit is covered with canvas but the lifeboat is still attached.
Robert's Notes: B17 "Dumbo", used for Air-Sea Rescue.

title: Iwo Jima
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Elevated view of Iwo Jima and the military base from Mount Surabachi.
Robert's Notes: View of Iwo Jima from Mt. Surabachi.
location: Iwo Jima, Tokyo, Japan, also known as Sulphur Island.TGN: 7016685

title: Sikorsky Helicopter
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Early Sikorsky helicopter. This one is an R-6. They were typically used for medical transit of wounded.
Robert's Notes: Helicopter, on Iwo. Yes, the thing really flies!
location: Iwo Jima, Tokyo, Japan, also known as Sulphur Island.TGN: 7016686

title: Camp Churo
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Camp Churo, a refugee camp for locals on Tinian Island. Reminder: Robert's notes are transcribed as is, and the quotes are his.
Robert's Notes: Camp Churo, Home for "Liberated" Koreans, known as 'Gooks'
location: Tinian, Tinian, Northern Mariana Islands, TGN: 1009462

title: Photo Development Shack
creator: Robert Ritter
description: A photo of Bob Ritter in the door of a small shack used for developing photographs.
Robert's Notes: This little building is not what you think!!! It is our photo shop.

title: Photo of Robert and friends on Tinain
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo of Bob and several friends on Tinian. The photo is somewhat damaged at the bottom and shows signs of water or coffee stains.
Robert's Notes: Left to Right - Pat, Bill, Dunning, Me, and Mike. On Tinian Island
location: Tinian, Tinian, Northern Mariana Islands, TGN: 1009462

title: Photo of Mount Surabachi and the Beach
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Beachside photo of Mt. Surabachi, showing the coast. Note the beached landing craft due to the tide.
Robert's Notes: Mt. Surabachi Iwo Jima
location: Iwo Jima, Tokyo, Japan, also known as Sulphur Island.TGN: 7016686

title: Shadow of Robert's B29 in China
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Arial photo of the shadow of a B29 on the ground.
Robert's Notes: Shadow of our B29, over China.

title: Fleet of B29 Stratofortresses on Iwo Jima
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo from the top of a B29 of the fleet on Iwo Jima.
Robert's Notes: B29's on Iwo Jima. The plane in the foreground is our B29, the "Tokyo-KO"
location: Iwo Jima, Tokyo, Japan, also known as Sulphur Island.TGN: 7016686

title: Damaged aircraft
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo of damaged aircraft on Iwo Jima. Two B29s are shown and a B24 Liberator. Damage caused by a cyclone.
Robert's Notes: Damaged planes on Iwo. Cyclone caused this!

title: Photo of Mount Surabachi and the Road
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo of Mount Surabachi on Iwo Jima, taken from the side of the road.
Robert's Notes: Mt. Surabachi, on Iwo Jima
location: Iwo Jima, Tokyo, Japan, also known as Sulphur Island.TGN: 7016686

title: P61 Black Widow
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo of P61 Black Widow on Iwo Jima. Variant is B61B-15. Note the hardpoints under the wings and remote controlled turret on the roof carrying four .50 caliber M2 browning machine guns. Men standing in front of and sitting in the cockpit are presumed the crew.
Robert's Notes: P-61 "Black Widow", on Iwo Jima
location: Iwo Jima, Tokyo, Japan, also known as Sulphur Island.TGN: 7016686

title: B29 "Tokyo-KO" and Crew, including Robert Ritter
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo of B29 Tokyo-KO and its crew. Robert Ritter refers to this B29 as his.
Robert's Notes: Okinawa 1945

title: Crew of "Tokyo-KO"
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo of the crew of "Tokyo KO" on Iwo Jima
Robert's Notes: Crew- taken on Iwo Jima
location: Iwo Jima, Tokyo, Japan, also known as Sulphur Island.TGN: 7016686

title: Crew of "Tokyo-KO"
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo of the crew of "Tokyo KO" on Iwo Jima
Robert's Notes: Picture of our crew, taken on Iwo Jima.
location: Iwo Jima, Tokyo, Japan, also known as Sulphur Island.TGN: 7016687

title: "Crew of the Week" dated 4 July, 1945
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo of the crew of the week on the Fourth of July, 1945.
Robert's Notes: (1-432-0-233 BU)(4 July 45)(Crew of the week)

title: Photo outside the barracks of Robert Ritter and friends.
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo of Robert Ritter and friends outside of barracks. Unclear if during basic training or while deployed.
Robert's Notes: Sgt. Srymba, Epstein, John Brown, Wendel Jomasouie, Bob Ritter, Joe Viggiano, Cpl. Justice, Jim Cornish

title: Photo outside barracks of Robert Ritter and friends
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo of Robert Ritter and friends outside of barracks. Unclear if during basic training or while deployed.
Robert's Notes: Epstein, Hank Koch, Sgt Srymba, J. B. Brown, Viggiano, Cpl. Justice

title: Robert and Mary Ritter
creator: Robert Ritter
description: Photo of Robert Ritter and his wife. Unclear if before leaving for basic training or after the war.
Robert's Notes: Bob and Mary Ritter.

title: Bob Ritter in 1944
creator: Robert Ritter
description: High School Graduation Photo of Robert Ritter in 1944
